Open Source

Open Source Projects

  • RSpec: I’m on the RSpec core team.

  • Ripple: I’m on the Ripple core team.

  • VCR: Ruby gem to record your test suite’s HTTP interactions and replay them during future test runs for fast, deterministic, accurate tests. Featured on:

    • Ruby 5
    • Ruby Weekly
    • The Ruby Show
    • Ruby Inside
    • Destroy all Software

  • Fractal Composer: Java library to algorithmically generate fractal compositions using self-similarity based on an initial seed.

  • Mail Safe: Ruby gem to prevent your ActionMailer emails from escaping into the wild during development. Featured on ruby 5.

  • Test Benchmarker: A tool for benchmarking ruby Test::Unit tests.

  • NullDB: An ActiveRecord null database adapter for greater speed and isolation in unit tests. Avdi Grimm originally wrote it and I am the current maintainer.

See my github profile for a complete list.

About Me

Husband and father, musician, software engineer at SEOmoz, open source developer specializing in Ruby and Rails, world traveler and Christian.
